structure.unit: B LICENSURE AND REGULATION OF HEALTH FACILITIES AND SERVICES

law.catch_line: Identification requirement for persons dealing with patients.

text.section: All health care facilities and services licensed under this chapter shall require all persons, including students, who examine, observe, or treat a patient or resident of the health care facility or service to wear identification which readily identifies, at a minimum, the person's first name, licensure credential, and position title or department.
The identification shall be of a size and type and appropriately displayed so that it may be easily detected and read.

law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 384, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1998.
